sources.title: That Good Night | Full Drama Movie | John Hurt | Sofia Helin
sources.description:
That Good Night - Ralph, a once-famous screenwriter, is in his seventies and terminally ill. He has two final missions: to be reconciled to his son, Michael, and, secretly, to ensure he is not a burden to his wife, Anna, as he goes "into that good night".
2017.  Stars: John Hurt, Sofia Helin, Max Brown, Charles Dance
